name: Saya
description: She is an intellect with good looks, but under her cool demeanor is the burning desire to win. Also extremely self-conscious and possessive...

passiveSkill.name: Rule by Strength
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Saya's Unique Skill has a {placeholder} chance of seckilling enemy partner, with every 5% difference in ATK increasing the chance by {placeholder}.Seckill: Instantly wipes out the enemy; equally effective against enemies with current Invincible or Death RES status."}

uniqueSkill.name: King of Sixth Heaven
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Serves all the sins with the speed of light. Saya attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder}  damage. If the target is an enemy partner, deals additional damage equal to {placeholder}  of max HP."}

specialSkill.name: Unparalleled
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Carries out an assassination effortlessly. Saya attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder}  damage, increasing her CRIT by {placeholder} when attacking. Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Demon Slash
normalSkill.description: Saya unleashes a focused strike. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder}  damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Serves all the sins with the speed of light. Saya attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder}  damage. If the target is an enemy partner, deals additional damage equal to {placeholder}  of max HP.
templateData.lens5.skill: Saya's Unique Skill has a {placeholder} chance of seckilling enemy partner, with every 5% difference in ATK increasing the chance by {placeholder}.Seckill: Instantly wipes out the enemy; equally effective against enemies with current Invincible or Death RES status.
templateData.lens6.skill: Carries out an assassination effortlessly. Saya attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder}  damage, increasing her CRIT by {placeholder} when attacking. Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
